title: Executives should learn like they’re running for president (Gerson Lehrman Group Inc)
text: ( Source : Gerson Lehrman Group Inc) Image : Wikimedia Commons At the Republican presidential debate at the Reagan Library in California on Wednesday, the candidates will be tested on their knowledge of immigration reform, ISIS , healthcare
